text: Honestly, the rest of us were more rattled than he was. I was just a kid freaking out because I thought I was going to lose my job, but Fairfax was surprisingly calm. I don't think he expected Cadenza to last forever. He just wanted to make the most out of an opportunity before legislation caught up. Plus, the guy gets to say he created one of the United States.
